turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to order me a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, which Starbucks should I go to.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go to the Starbucks on Mountain Ave.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what drink did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Caramel Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need it to be a venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what kind of dairy?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pumps of caramel?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it 10 pumps of caramel?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want extra whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you also want extra caramel drizzle?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want extra caramel drizzle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What temperature do you want it to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the drink extra hot!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the total is 8.96, is that fine?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that fine!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I ordered your drink and I'll see you in 10 minutes.
